text: As a follow up to our previous post, this chart breaks down the percentage of specific groups in the U.S. that are hesitant to take the #covid19 #vaccine, according to data from the @KFF. https://t.co/CbMK65Z0Rm @mikequindazzi #BigData #MachineLearning #AI #IoT copy: rt @stat https://t.co/5Dx8jsSl55
